title: Boris Yeltsin's Surprise Resignation
description: Mrs Yeltsin, on the day her husband shocked the world,  half a century since the Mafia's grip on America was exposed, the 1999 protests in Iran - the biggest since the revolution - a student tells us how a photograph led to his death sentence and the Brazilian woman hijacker who took her kids along for the ride.
itunes:subtitle: Mrs Yeltsin, on the day Boris shocked the world plus the Mafia's grip on America exposed.
itunes:summary: Mrs Yeltsin, on the day her husband shocked the world,  half a century since the Mafia's grip on America was exposed, the 1999 protests in Iran - the biggest since the revolution - a student tells us how a photograph led to his death sentence and the Brazilian woman hijacker who took her kids along for the ride.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
